question:
You work at home and have a problem with a piece of equipment that you use for your job.
Write a letter to the shop or company which supplied the equipment in your letter


Describe the problem with the equipment 
Explain how this problem is affecting your work
Say what you want the shop or company to do
text: I am writing to express my dissatisfaction with the UPS I had purchased from your store last week.

Even though I have charged the device for 4 hours it is not giving the power backup when there is a power outage. However, your store guaranteed me that it will support me for more than two hours. In addition to this, sometimes it is not giving me time to shut down smoothly.

Since there are frequent power cuts in my area and UPS is not giving power back up my project deliverables are getting delayed. Moreover, it shuts down the system while I am in the middle of a client meeting. Therefore it is seriously impacting my work.

While I am purchasing this item, the store guarantees me that if there is an issue within a year, they will be responsible for it, so I am entitled to request that you either refund the amount or exchange the item.
I am waiting for your service.
